title: KHR_materials_specular glTF extension
description: glTF extension that defines the translucency of the material.

translucencyFactor.description: The percentage of light that is transmitted through the surface.
translucencyFactor.gltf_detailedDescription: The percentage of non-specularly reflected light that is transmitted through the surface via a Lambertian diffuse transmission.

translucencyTexture.description: A greyscale texture that defines the percentage of light transmitted through the surface.
translucencyTexture.gltf_detailedDescription: A greyscale texture that defines the percentage of non-specularly reflected light transmitted through the surface via a Lambertian diffuse transmission. Will be multiplied by translucencyFactor.
